item.title: FreeBSD 12.2-RC1 Available
item.description: The first RC build for the FreeBSD 12.2 release cycle is now available. ISO images for the amd64, armv6, armv7, arm64, i386, powerpc, powerpc64, powerpcspe, and sparc64 architectures are available on most of our FreeBSD mirror sites.

item.title: FreeBSD 12.2-BETA3 Available
item.description: The third BETA build for the FreeBSD 12.2 release cycle is now available. ISO images for the amd64, armv6, armv7, arm64, i386, powerpc, powerpc64, and powerpcspe architectures are available on most of our FreeBSD mirror sites.

item.title: FreeBSD 12.2-BETA2 Available
item.description: The second BETA build for the FreeBSD 12.2 release cycle is now available. ISO images for the amd64, armv6, armv7, arm64, i386, powerpc, powerpc64, powerpcspe, and sparc64 architectures are available on most of our FreeBSD mirror sites.

item.title: FreeBSD 12.2-BETA1 Available
item.description: The first BETA build for the FreeBSD 12.2 release cycle is now available. ISO images for the amd64, armv6, armv7, arm64, i386, powerpc, powerpc64, powerpcspe, and sparc64 architectures are available on most of our FreeBSD mirror sites.

item.title: April-June 2020 Status Report
item.description: The April to June 2020 Status Report is now available with 51 entries.

item.title: New FreeBSD Core Team Elected
item.description: Active committers to the project have elected your eleventh FreeBSD Core Team. For details, refer to the official announcement.

item.title: FreeBSD 11.4-RELEASE Available
item.description: FreeBSD 11.4-RELEASE is now available. Please be sure to check the Release Notes and Release Errata before installation for any late-breaking news and/or issues with 11.4. More information about FreeBSD releases can be found on the Release Information page.
